content.rendered:
Contact Us

DEAR BUSINESS PARTNER

Tourism is an evergreen industry if you are interested to starts and manage your own travel business you are welcome in the world of renowned Namaste India Trip. Namaste India Trip giving an immense opportunity to be a loyal Franchisee for us. As a authorized retail outlet of Namaste India Trip, You can promote and sell the various world class products of NIT i.e. FIT-family tour ,GIT- Group tour, corporate & MICE tour, School tour, Honeymoon Tour, Adventure tour package, Gift holidays, various customize and other special products.

TRAVEL BUSINESS IN PRESENT SCENARIO

From last two decade service industries play about 80% role in Total GDP of India and overseas also. In Indian perspective travel business contribute of 6.23 % of the total GDP and considered as largest service industries. On the basis of estimation of world travel organization (WTO) Indian travel industries is expected to generate US $375.5 billion by 2018 at a 9.4 per cent annual growth rate. Due to economic growth of Country participation of the middle class and augmentation in the number of foreign tourists to visit India increases day by day.

According to survey of PATA (Pacific Asia Travel Association) , India is a fastest growing countries for domestic and outbound tourism in the world. To break their daily routine and hectic lifestyles, peoples plan a holidays. Diversity in resources of India provides a great opportunity to rejuvenate them by offering Sun, Sea and Sand. Easy access of internet, Cheap and huge discounts in airfares & travel services, tourism products are now very popular reachable among all class of Society. Thus lead to the development of the travel industry and consequently the success of travel service provides. Due to huge technological development the whole travel process has become quite easy & convenient. Thus now in present scenario the growth in Indian tourism market is going to boom & flourish due to growth of it intermediaries like hotel industry, aviation & medical tourism industry.

Our Product Offerings

  • A reputed organization in travel Industry & top online travel portals in India.
  • Namaste India Trip.com is popular among number of guest in India and overseas.
  • Thousands of delights customer with our quality services.
  • A wide Network of various hotels and transporters and other channel partners among all destinations in country.
  • 24 x 7 franchisee and client supports.
  • Automated and easy booking process.
  • Fare Mark-up Tool to enable you to earn more commissions.
  • Best commissions and attractive incentive programs
  • Official email address to franchisee on NamasteIndiaTrip.com portal.

Marketing & Sales Support

We provide following marketing and free ad material.

  • Advertising and Marketing campaigns conducted by Company itself
  • Display Shine board
  • Travel magazine
  • Brochures & Flyers
  • Posters
  • Standees
  • Certificate of approval

    • Bussiness Starting Kit

  • Namaste India Trip.com T-shirt
  • NIT (Namaste India Trip.com) logo printed pen, Writing Pad, Business card & other stationary.

As to encourage the self employment & brand imaging Namste India Trip.com require a low investments by the person who need our franchisee. The person wish to be our franchise will pay a non-refundable franchise fee of INR 2 Lakh in metro & Tier 1 cities and 1 Lakh in other Tier 2 cities. There is made a agreement between company and franchisee partner valid upto the five years. The agreement may be renew on new agreement by mutual consent.

Infrastructure requirement from the Applicant

  • Well furnished Retail outlet space measuring 200 – 500 sq feet (own/rented at least 5 years)
  • Location – A busy location, like- high street, Main road and mall locations etc. But parameters must match with NIT.
  • At least two front office sales staff.
  • Exterior visible signboard.
  • The interiors and the exteriors will maintain according guidelines of NIT.
  • Expanses on renovation of premises will be borne by the Franchisee.
  • Broadband internet connection, communication, electricity etc. expanses directly borne by Franchisee.

    Contact Us

    Name of Organisation/ Company:

    Date of Establishment: *

    Address:

    Pan No:

    State: *

    No. of Staff:

    Concern Person Name: *

    Service Tax No:

    Designation:

    Phone: *

    Email: *

    Website:

    Our Product Offerings

    • A brand name equity of reputed organization in travel Industry.
    • Namaste India Trip.com is popular among over 250 million guests in India and overseas.
    • Million of delights customer with our quality services.
    • A wide Network of various hotels and transporters and other channel partners among all destinations in country.
    • 24 x 7 franchisee and client supports. • Product and periodic sales training & support by our experienced professionals.
    • Appointment of Branch Manager on the payroll of Namaste India Trip.Com responsible to run business and manage operations.
    • Automated and easy booking process.
    • Fare Mark-up Tool to enable you to earn more commissions.
    • Official email address to franchisee on NamasteIndiaTrip.com portal.

    Marketing & Sales Support

    • Advertising and Marketing campaigns conducted by Company itself.
    • Display Shine board
    • Travel magazine
    • Brochures & Flyers
    • Posters
    • Standees
    • Certificate of approval

      • Bussiness Starting Kit

    • Namaste India Trip.com T-shirt
    • NIT (Namaste India Trip.com) logo printed pen, Writing Pad, Business card & other stationary.

    We have wide range of Product according to need and budget.

    • FIT Tour package (Inbound, Outbond & Domestic) Standard & special Customized Tour
    • GIT Tour package (Inbound, Outbond & Domestic) Escorted tour to all destinations
    • All Indian destination package Tour
    • MICE –Corporate & business travel requirements
    • Special Honeymoon tour
    • Adventure Tours
    • Educational tour
    • All India Pilgrimage tour
    • Hotel reservation (all India and Abroad)
    • Flight domestic and International (Huge discount on instant booking)
    • Railway reservation
    • Bus/ Car/Volvo Reservation
    • Cruises & travel insurance
    • Visas & forex departments

    For a profitable franchisee relation we have following features

    • Minimum investment & High Returns.
    • Minimizing the risk, it is risky to start new Business is risky. Association with well-recognized brand minimize the risk.
    • Association with leading, award winning and brand travel organization.
    • Benefit of Brand equity, popularity of brand name and its recognition.
    • To access the entire range of products of Namaste India Trip.com by online System access and logins.
    • Product and sales training & support of experienced tourism professional.
    • Guidance & Appointment of Branch Manager on the payroll of Namaste India Trip.Com responsible to run business and manage operations.
    • Low Operational Expenses.
    • Best commissions and attractive incentive programs.
    • Association with Namaste India Trip and franchisee outlets name also listed on the website.
